front.title: Mobile IPv6 - NSIS Interaction for Firewall traversal

abstract.t: Most of the firewalls deployed today are Mobile IPv6 unaware.Widespread Mobile IPv6 deployment is not possible unless Mobile IPv6messages can pass through these firewalls. One approach is to use asignaling protocol to communicate with these firewalls and instructthem to bypass these Mobile IPv6 messages. The goal of this documentis to describe the interaction between NSIS and Mobile IPv6 forenabling Mobile IPv6 traversal.
